entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
